subject: Volleyball
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Hugh McCutcheon was named the coach of the United States women’s volleyball team less than four months after guiding the men to an Olympic gold medal following the fatal stabbing of his father-in-law at the Beijing Games.
snippet: Hugh McCutcheon was named the coach of the United States women’s volleyball team less than four months after guiding the men to an Olympic gold medal following the fatal stabbing of his father-in-law at the Beijing Games.
